name: Boats - Big guns
description:
Boats - Big guns

Just a prototype for now. I was just messing around with rigidbodies and forces once again. This current build is buggy and only has 1 boat.

Controls:

Hold "Shift" and press "R" to reset whole level.

Hold "Shift" and press "Escape" to quit game.

Use "A" and "D" to turn your cannon.

Press "R" to reset boats position.

"Left-click" to shoot.

Press "H" while in boat game scene to show the controls panel.

Enjoy :)

p.s Loading screen is fake, just for fun :)
